prompt_base: ultra-realistic 8k raw photo, portrait of a brilliant young woman, voluminous auburn hair, elegant face, (clear black-framed glasses:1.2)
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching checkered fabric:1.2), individual hair strands, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, 3d render, (deformed glasses:1.3), low quality, airbrushed skin
